Name: Training as a technical system planner (aGw*)
Tags: systemplaner bamberg deggendorg muenchen coburg azubi teil
Beschreibung: With your training as a technical system planner HLSK (aGw*) you will become part of our team from 01.09 and take on a key role within our group of companies. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Basic drawing training and creation of CAD plans in 2D/3D
Practice-oriented work through collaboration on projects
Planning the supply of heating, cooling, air and water to buildings together with colleagues
Cross-location processing of exciting, innovative and challenging projects in an international team
Eigenschaften:
You have a good spatial sense
You have a technical understanding and mathematical knowledge
You enjoy working with computers
You are a team player, reliable and have an independent way of working
You have at least a secondary school leaving certificate

Name: Specialist planner HLSK (aGw*)
Tags: fachplaner frankfurt berlin muenchen stuttgart coburg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Frankfurt, Berlin, Munich, Stuttgart, Coburg, Deggendorf, Sofia, Varna
Beschreibung: As an HVAC specialist planner (aGw*), you will play a key role in the realization of our projects and make a significant contribution to the development of our group of companies. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Implementation of challenging and exciting TGA projects across all HOAI service phases
Development of innovative, resource-saving system solutions
Conception, planning, tendering and, if necessary, site supervision of TGA projects
BIM planning with digital twin and 3D modeling
Eigenschaften:
You have a degree, a master craftsman/technician qualification in supply and building services engineering or comparable training.
You feel at home in the field of heating, ventilation, sanitation or air conditioning.
You are motivated by the creation of innovative, resource-saving system solutions.
You are familiar with the relevant standards, guidelines and common project management tools such as Revit, Orca or Plancal Nova.
You have an independent way of working and a quick grasp of complex issues
You take initiative and are a team player.

Name: Technical system planner HLSK (aGw*)
Tags: systemplaner frankfurt berlin muenchen stuttgart coburg bamberg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Frankfurt, Berlin, Munich, Stuttgart, Coburg, Bamberg, Deggendorf, Sofia, Varna

Aufgaben:
Design of technical building systems with 2D/3D CAD software (Revit/Plancal)
Processing of BIM projects
Carrying out calculations and dimensioning of technical building systems
Coordination and consultation with other specialist departments and external partners
Support with project management and documentation
Eigenschaften:
You have completed training as a technical system planner in HVAC or have comparable qualifications.
You feel at home in the field of heating, ventilation, sanitation or air conditioning.
You are familiar with the relevant standards, guidelines and common CAD tools such as Revit or Plancal Nova.
You have an independent and structured way of working.
You are a strong communicator and enjoy working in a team.

Name: Project Manager HLSK (aGw*)
Tags: projektleiter frankfurt berlin muenchen stuttgart coburg bamberg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Frankfurt, Berlin, Munich, Stuttgart, Coburg, Bamberg, Deggendorf, Sofia, Varna
Beschreibung: As Project Manager HLSK (aGw*) you will play a key role in the realization of our projects and make a significant contribution to the development of our group of companies. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Responsibility for the technical and economic implementation of TGA projects across all HOAI service phases
Management, coordination and control of your project team as well as close cooperation with all project participants and the management team
Organizational and technical handling with the client
Cost and schedule management
Contact person for clients and partners throughout the entire course of the project
Eigenschaften:
You have a degree, a master craftsman/technician qualification in supply and building services engineering or comparable training.
You feel at home in the field of heating, ventilation, sanitation or air conditioning.
You are motivated by the creation of innovative, resource-saving system solutions.
You are familiar with the relevant standards, guidelines and common project management tools such as Revit, Orca or Plancal Nova.
You have an independent way of working and a quick grasp of complex issues, have an economic sense when working on projects and always keep an eye on costs.
You are self-reflective, a team player and a strong communicator.

Name: Project Manager ELT (aGw*)
Tags: projektleiter frankfurt berlin muenchen stuttgart coburg bamberg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Frankfurt, Berlin, Munich, Stuttgart, Coburg, Bamberg, Deggendorf, Sofia, Varna
Beschreibung: As Project Manager ELT (aGw*) you will play a key role in the realization of our projects and make a significant contribution to the development of our group of companies. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Responsibility for the technical and economic implementation of TGA projects across all HOAI service phases
Management, coordination and control of your project team as well as close cooperation with all project participants and the management team
Organizational and technical handling with the client
Cost and schedule management
Contact person for clients and partners throughout the entire course of the project
Eigenschaften:
You have a degree, a master craftsman/technician qualification in the field of supply and building services engineering or comparable training.
You feel at home in the field of electrical engineering and have several years of professional experience in managing projects in this area (LPH 1-9).
You are familiar with relevant standards, guidelines and common project management tools such as Revit, Orca or Plancal Nova.
You have an independent way of working and a quick grasp of complex issues, have an economic sense when working on projects and always keep an eye on costs.
You are self-reflective, a team player and a strong communicator.
